Uses of Class
harrygpotter.tombola.tombolalib.TTombolaRuntimeException

    • Uses of TTombolaRuntimeException in harrygpotter.tombola.tombolalib

      Methods in harrygpotter.tombola.tombolalib that throw TTombolaRuntimeException 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      long TGame.getElapsedTime()
      Return the elapsed time, in milliseconds, since the beginning of this tombola game. If the game hasn't already been started, this method raise a runtime exception. If the game has already finished, this method returns the duration of the game.
      long TGame.getEndTimestamp()
      Return the timestamp (a long value indicating the standard 'system time') of the ending moment of the game.
      long TGame.getStartTimestamp()
      Return the timestamp (a long value indicating the standard 'system time') of the beginning of the game.
      void TAbstractSetFactory.joinOnEnded()
      Invoke this method to block your execution and wait the completion (or the interruption) of the Java thread dedicated to the generation of the series of cards.
      void TAbstractSetFactory.joinOnEnded​(long mSecsTimeout)
      Invoke this method to block your execution and wait either the completion (or the interruption) of the Java thread dedicated to the generation of the series of cards, or the timeout passed as input parameter.
      void TSeriesList.prepareLabels​(int start, int end, String tagSeparator, TSeriesList.TLabelingModes mode, boolean ctrlCode)
      This batch method assign a label to each card of the specified subset of series within this series list, allowing for some customization of the method used to prepare each single label.
      TSeriesList TFileFormatter.readSeriesFile​(String fileName)
      This method reads a list of series of cards from a file previously created using TFileFormatter.writeSeriesFile(String, TSeriesList, TCardFormat, OpenOption) companion method on this class. It returns a TSeriesList object ready to be managed by all other TombolaLib classes and methods.  File format is automatically determined using tags on the file header lines.
      TSeriesList TFileFormatter.readSeriesFile​(String fileName, TCardFormat format)
      This method reads a list of series of cards from a file previously created using TFileFormatter.writeSeriesFile(String, TSeriesList, TCardFormat, OpenOption) companion method on this class.It returns a TSeriesList object ready to be managed by all other TombolaLib classes and methods.
      void TAbstractSetFactory.requestStop()
      Invoke this method to request the interruption of the series generation algorithm before it completes all desired series of cards.
      void TGame.setAwards​(TAwardList awards)
      Set the (previously prepared, see TAwardList) list of awards that will be available during the game. As usual, even this setter method can be invoked only during the INITIALIZING status of the tombola game object.
      void TGame.setConfirmCandidateOn​(boolean confirmCandidateOn)
      When set to true (default is false), this parameter stops the evaluation process executed after each number extraction and allows the user to explicitly accept or deny cards that have reached the score for an available award. So, for example, it is possible to exclude (deny) a card if the player do not claim her/his award.
